description: A Bloodling Thrall is a corrupted, mindless servant bound to its master's will. These creatures are formed from the lifeblood of the fallen, animated by dark magic. They appear as gaunt, hollow-eyed beings with translucent, blood-tinted skin, constantly dripping with a dark, viscous fluid.

traits.name: Blood Drain
traits.description: If the Bloodling Thrall successfully hits with a melee attack, it can attempt to drain the life force from the target. The target must succeed on a DC 12 Constitution saving throw or take 1d4 necrotic damage and the Bloodling Thrall regains hit points equal to the necrotic damage dealt.

actions.name: Claw
actions.description: Melee Weapon Attack: +4 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1d6+2 slashing damage.
